testcase.name: Rest service should save record to pdf repository
Rest service should update record of pdf
Rest service should delete the record of given id
Rest service should Get the content of given id's pdf
Rest service should Get All The Pdfs

failure.message: "...ays be available in [all the] test cases","id":1}..." did not equal "...ays be available in [rest Services] test cases","id":1}..."
